attributes.action: Help for children suffering from EDS - Eherls danlos syndrom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are so many children suffering for many years from EDS, My own children have been suffering for years and without getting help. I was lucky that I managered to get them help privately but the government offers no help and leaves these children suffering in pain, when with treatment they can be helped. The doctors needs to be trained and the social workers help to be forthcoming with help for these children unstead of leaving them to suffer and stating they do not fit our criteria.

Regards
